name: PEOPLEFORBIKES COALITION (FKA BIKES BELONG COALITION)
description: Coalition of bicycle suppliers and retailers
sampleDescriptions: Implementation of transportation issues within the reathorization of surface transportation legislation FAST Act (PL 114-94) and FY2017  and FY 2018 Transportation Appropriations legislation, includin
Issues related to trade, tariffs and NAFTA.
Tax reform. Issues related to the collection of online sales tax, PHIT Act (HR 1267; S. 482) and the bicycle commuter tax benefit.
Implementation of the Outdoor Recreation's Economic Contributions Act of 2016 (PL 114-249).
